episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001:
Sparkly and green? Yeah, I saw something like
that over there.

There’s a surprisingly large number of people
saying they’ve seen those cells!

If we keep this up, we’ll have this wrapped up
in no time!
episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001: We didn’t find a single one!
This might be harder than we originally thought...
Yo! What’re you lot up to?

We’re looking for something. Y’see, there’s these
things all over Pasio that—
Wait! What’s that you’re holding?
Oh, this? I picked it up over there.

Don’t see something like this every day, right?
I was gonna take it home and research it!
That’s actually part of a Pokémon called Zygarde.
Zygarde? Oh! You mean that one right there?

Yup! Professor Sycamore asked us to help him
conduct some research on it.

Zygarde’s a Pokémon that’s made up of a
bunch of cells, right?

I’d heard rumors that it’s been spotted in the
Crown Tundra before, but this the first time
I’ve actually seen one of its cells in person!

Oh, so you already knew all about it! No
wonder you’re Professor Sonia’s assistant!
Do you happen to know anything else?
Well...not really.

But if Zygarde is a Legendary Pokémon that’s
shown up in Kalos, Alola, and even Galar...

maybe a Pokémon Professor from Galar or Alola
would know something about it!

Er...Sonia’s busy doing talks and presentations on
her research, though.

Why don’t we find a professor from Alola and ask
them about it?
Yeah! Let me come with you!

I’m happy to help Professor Sycamore with
his investigation!
episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001:
Sorry! I’d love to help you out, but I don’t know
much more than you do.

Do you know anyone else who might know more
about Zygarde?
Oh! Now that you mention it, I do!
Hm...but I dunno about that guy...

Well, just a rumor. I hear there’s a guy who’s
researching Zygarde on Pasio.

I also heard he’s a bit overzealous with his
research methods.
I’m not sure if I wanna introduce you to him.
Could you do it anyway? Please?

Well...OK. I’ll get in contact and let him know
you’re researching Zygarde.
episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4004_1001: Why are you disrupting my research?!
If Zygarde feels that its life is in danger...

it might just bring all of its cells together in one
place on its own!

That doesn’t make it OK! Hurting Pokémon
is wrong!

Wrong? Preposterous! If the ends justify the
means, then nothing is off the table.

Now I get what Professor Kukui meant by
overzealous...
We can’t let him get away with this!
I’m sorry, Zygarde...

We never should’ve rushed the investigation...
We should have stuck by you, step by step.

Can you forgive us? And maybe give us
another chance?
I assure you, there won’t be another chance!
Ack! Wh-what’s that light?!
Zygarde! You’ll lend us your power?

I won’t let you have Zygarde! It’s MY research
subject! I’ve claimed it!

Pokémon aren’t tools or research subjects to be
claimed! They’re our precious partners!

The way you view Pokémon is just wrong!
It’s absolutely unacceptable!
Drat! I was so close!
Hey! You all OK over there?

I got worried, so I came to check on how things
were going.
Professor!
I saw that scientist running away.
I never realized he was part of Team Break...
I’m sorry for putting you through that, kids.
No, Professor! It wasn’t your fault!

Yeah! We’re the ones who pushed you to introduce
us to him, even though you didn’t want to.
Well, I’m glad you’re all OK.
That said, now we’re back to square one.
It’s OK!
We’ll collect all of the cells ourselves, one by one!
And we’ll do it together with Zygarde!

Well, that’s quite the endeavor. But I’m sure you
can do it!
I’m rooting for you!
episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4005_1001: What’s it doing with that ring? Whoa!

I think it warped space to create a path that
connects to somewhere else!
What do you think Hoopa is trying to do?

I wonder if it’s trying to help Zygarde get
back home.
Are you sure about this, Zygarde?

Zygarde decided to stay on Pasio, then! Guess we
should respect that, yeah?

It could be that Zygarde has some unfinished
business on Pasio.

For example...maybe it wants to do even more
exploring with you!
I’m not sure what you wanna do here, Zygarde...
But I’ll stay with you till you finish it!
episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4006_1001:
Here you go, Zygarde! These are all the cells
I’ve found!
Whoa. That was bright! What just happened?

Looks like you were able to collect quite a number
of cells!

We never did figure out why you’re here, Zygarde.
But it seems like this is the last—
Oh my. It went and scattered its cells again.

What are you doing? We worked so hard to
collect those for you, you know.
You want us to go with you somewhere?
I’m not entirely sure, but why don’t we follow it?
episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4007_1001: Let’s take him to the Pokémon Center!
Wait—you want to go somewhere else now?

You can go with Zygarde. I’ll take care of
things here.
episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4008_1001: How did you even find us?!
Team Break? Oh, and look over there!

Gah! Well, if our cover’s busted, we’ve got
no choice!

What’re those green sparkly things?! They’re all
going to that Pokémon...
Oh, I get it! Count me in, Zygarde! I’m ready!

C’mon! We have to get this Pokémon to the
Pokémon Center!
episode_event_ch0130_10_serena/4009_1001:
Both the Pokémon and its Trainer are in good
hands now.
I’m so glad to hear that!

Oh! Were you the ones who helped
him, Professor?
Looker!

I’ve been searching for a Trainer reported as
missing for a while now. I’m glad you found him!

From what I hear, he did everything he could to
protect his Pokémon from Team Break...
But he got injured and couldn’t walk!
Oh! So that means...

Yeah. That Pokémon you saved from Team Break
was his partner.

Thanks, Zygarde. You’re the one that found them,
aren’t you.

Huh. That must be why Zygarde sent its cells
all over Pasio again! It was looking for that
Trainer and his Pokémon!

A human tried to protect his partner Pokémon,
and a Pokémon worried more about its partner
than its own well-being...

As the guardian of the ecosystem, Zygarde must
have realized how much they cared for each other.

I feel like I’ve learned yet another new thing
about Zygarde!

True. You’ve learned from Zygarde what it means
to be strong enough to protect others...

And I’m sure Zygarde learned from your
compassion and willingness to help others, Serena!

In collecting all of Zygarde’s cells, you earned
more than just a glimpse at its complete form...
It brought your hearts together.
It really did!

Zygarde, I hope you’ll continue to lend me
your power!
Together, we can protect everyone around us!
